nodes.text: Roff Volane was a male, who served in the military and attained the rank of Captain. During a conflict on the planet Pleida, he assigned a group of agents to escort the surgeon Lieutenant Pleth Juun to the base Camp Kavel, where a number of officers had been injured.
Volane had a lot of combat experience, which made him curt, cynical and humorless. However, despite this, he was highly respected by those who served with him.
